General.Name: Beijing Join-Cheer Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Join-Cheer Software Co., Ltd. provides management software in China. The company offers financial shared service center, tax management, electronic accounting file, electronic image management system, expense control management, financial, and group funding solutions; and management accounting, comprehensive budget, cost management, group control and comprehensive risk management, enterprise operation and state-owned assets supervision platform, and fund monitor system solutions. It also provides enterprise big data, final accounts consolidated statement, comprehensive statistical management, financial data center, data quality management and risk control plan; smart finance; capital operation; and enterprise cloud solutions. The company serves e-government, group management, and digital communication sectors, as well as state organs, enterprises, institutions, and social groups. Beijing Join-Cheer Software Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Beijing Economic and Tech Dev Zone, Beijing, China, 100176
